name: Harvey P. Siy
content: Harvey Siy | College of Information Science & Technology | University of Nebraska Omaha Harvey Siy Harvey Siy, Ph.D. Professor Undergraduate Program Chair Computer Science email: hsiy@unomaha.edu office: PKI 281B office phone: 402.554.2834 lab room: PKI 355 fax: 402.554.3400 personal website: https://hsiy.github.io note: This profile is pulling in data from Digital Measures. Postings on personal websites or social media do not indicate that the individual is speaking on behalf of UNO. General Information General Information Biography Professor at Department of Computer Science, University of Nebraska at Omaha since Fall 2020. (Assistant Professor from Fall 2005 to Spring 2011. Associate Professor from Fall 2011 to Spring 2020.) Teaching Interests Software engineeringSoftware evolution and maintenanceUser interface design and developmentComputational thinking Research Interests ​​​​Empirical studies of software engineeringMining software repositoriesSoftware product linesKnowledge management in software engineeringSoftware evolutionSoftware assurance, reliability, and performance Service Summary Computer Science Undergraduate Program Committee ChairComputer Science Education Graduate Program Chair Education Ph D, University of Maryland - College Park, College Park, Maryland, Computer Science, 1996 Scholarship/Research/Creative Activity Scholarship/Research/Creative Activity Externally Funded Research Strategies: Strategic Problem-Based Approach to Rouse Computer Science (SPARCS), National Science Foundation, Federal, 01/01/2015 - 12/31/2019
